alert.note: Alert for Forest (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Forest County through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carter, or 12 miles southeast of Crandon, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Forest County, including the following locations... Laona, Wabeno, Cavour and Blackwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
